data.textUthmani: طسٓ ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: طسٓ ۚ [Ta Seen] تِلْكَ [These] ءَايَـٰتُ [(are the) Verses] ٱلْقُرْءَانِ [(of) the Quran] وَكِتَابٍۢ [and a Book] مُّبِينٍ [clear]
data.transliteration: Ta-seen tilka ayatualqur-ani wakitabin mubeen

data.textUthmani: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
data.wordByWord: هُدًۭى [A guidance] وَبُشْرَىٰ [and glad tidings] لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ [for the believers]
data.transliteration: Hudan wabushra lilmu/mineen

data.textUthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱلَّذِينَ [Those who] يُقِيمُونَ [establish] ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ [the prayer] وَيُؤْتُونَ [and give] ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ [zakah] وَهُم [and they] بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [in the Hereafter] هُمْ [[they]] يُوقِنُونَ [believe with certainty]
data.transliteration: Allatheena yuqeemoona assalatawayu/toona azzakata wahum bil-akhiratihum yooqinoon

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe] بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [in the Hereafter] زَيَّنَّا [We have made fair-seeming] لَهُمْ [to them] أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ [their deeds] فَهُمْ [so they] يَعْمَهُونَ [wander blindly]
data.transliteration: Inna allatheena la yu/minoonabil-akhirati zayyanna lahum aAAmalahumfahum yaAAmahoon

data.textUthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] ٱلَّذِينَ [(are) the ones] لَهُمْ [for them] سُوٓءُ [(is) an evil] ٱلْعَذَابِ [[the] punishment] وَهُمْ [and they] فِى [in] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [the Hereafter] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ [(will be) the greatest losers]
data.transliteration: Ola-ika allatheena lahum soo-oalAAathabi wahum fee al-akhirati humu al-akhsaroon

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّكَ [And indeed, you] لَتُلَقَّى [surely, receive] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [the Quran] مِن [from [near]] لَّدُنْ [from [near]] حَكِيمٍ [the All-Wise] عَلِيمٍ [the All-Knower]
data.transliteration: Wa-innaka latulaqqa alqur-anamin ladun hakeemin AAaleem

data.textUthmani: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] قَالَ [said] مُوسَىٰ [Musa] لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ [to his family] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, I] ءَانَسْتُ [perceive] نَارًۭا [a fire] سَـَٔاتِيكُم [I will bring you] مِّنْهَا [from it] بِخَبَرٍ [some information] أَوْ [or] ءَاتِيكُم [I will bring you] بِشِهَابٍۢ [a torch] قَبَسٍۢ [burning] لَّعَلَّكُمْ [so that you may] تَصْطَلُونَ [warm yourselves]
data.transliteration: Ith qala moosa li-ahlihiinnee anastu naran saateekum minhabikhabarin aw ateekum bishihabin qabasinlaAAallakum tastaloon

data.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [But when] جَآءَهَا [he came to it] نُودِىَ [he was called] أَنۢ [[that]] بُورِكَ [Blessed is] مَن [who] فِى [(is) at] ٱلنَّارِ [the fire] وَمَنْ [and whoever] حَوْلَهَا [(is) around it] وَسُبْحَـٰنَ [And glory be] ٱللَّهِ [(to) Allah] رَبِّ [(the) Lord] ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [(of) the worlds]
data.transliteration: Falamma jaaha noodiya anboorika man fee annari waman hawlahawasubhana Allahi rabbi alAAalameen

data.textUthmani: يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
data.wordByWord: يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ [O Musa] إِنَّهُۥٓ [Indeed] أَنَا [I Am] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] ٱلْعَزِيزُ [the All-Mighty] ٱلْحَكِيمُ [the All-Wise]
data.transliteration: Ya moosa innahu ana AllahualAAazeezu alhakeem

data.textUthmani: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَلْقِ [And, "Throw] عَصَاكَ ۚ [your staff] فَلَمَّا [But when] رَءَاهَا [he saw it] تَهْتَزُّ [moving] كَأَنَّهَا [as if it] جَآنٌّۭ [(were) a snake] وَلَّىٰ [he turned back] مُدْبِرًۭا [(in) flight] وَلَمْ [and (did) not] يُعَقِّبْ ۚ [look back] يَـٰمُوسَىٰ [O Musa] لَا [(Do) not] تَخَفْ [fear] إِنِّى [Indeed, [I]] لَا [(do) not] يَخَافُ [fear] لَدَىَّ [(in) My presence] ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ [the Messengers]
data.transliteration: Waalqi AAasaka falamma raahatahtazzu kaannaha jannun walla mudbiranwalam yuAAaqqib ya moosa la takhaf innee layakhafu ladayya almursaloon

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَن [who] ظَلَمَ [wrongs] ثُمَّ [then] بَدَّلَ [substitutes] حُسْنًۢا [good] بَعْدَ [after] سُوٓءٍۢ [evil] فَإِنِّى [then indeed, I Am] غَفُورٌۭ [Oft-Forgiving] رَّحِيمٌۭ [Most Merciful]
data.transliteration: Illa man thalama thummabaddala husnan baAAda soo-in fa-innee ghafoorun raheem

data.textUthmani: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ۖ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَـٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَدْخِلْ [And enter] يَدَكَ [your hand] فِى [into] جَيْبِكَ [your bosom] تَخْرُجْ [it will come forth] بَيْضَآءَ [white] مِنْ [without] غَيْرِ [without] سُوٓءٍۢ ۖ [harm] فِى [(These are) among] تِسْعِ [nine] ءَايَـٰتٍ [signs] إِلَىٰ [to] فِرْعَوْنَ [Firaun] وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ [and his people] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] كَانُوا۟ [are] قَوْمًۭا [a people] فَـٰسِقِينَ [defiantly disobedient]
data.transliteration: Waadkhil yadaka fee jaybika takhruj baydaamin ghayri soo-in fee tisAAi ayatin ilafirAAawna waqawmihi innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen

data.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
data.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [But when] جَآءَتْهُمْ [came to them] ءَايَـٰتُنَا [Our Signs] مُبْصِرَةًۭ [visible] قَالُوا۟ [they said] هَـٰذَا [This] سِحْرٌۭ [(is) a magic] مُّبِينٌۭ [manifest]
data.transliteration: Falamma jaat-hum ayatunamubsiratan qaloo hatha sihrun mubeen

data.textUthmani: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَجَحَدُوا۟ [And they rejected] بِهَا [them] وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ [though were convinced with them (signs)] أَنفُسُهُمْ [themselves] ظُلْمًۭا [(out of) injustice] وَعُلُوًّۭا ۚ [and haughtiness] فَٱنظُرْ [So see] كَيْفَ [how] كَانَ [was] عَـٰقِبَةُ [(the) end] ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ [(of) the corrupters]
data.transliteration: Wajahadoo biha wastayqanat-haanfusuhum thulman waAAuluwwan fanthurkayfa kana AAaqibatu almufsideen

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ عِلْمًا ۖ وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] ءَاتَيْنَا [We gave] دَاوُۥدَ [Dawood] وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ [and Sulaiman] عِلْمًۭا ۖ [knowledge] وَقَالَا [and they said] ٱلْحَمْدُ [Praise be] لِلَّهِ [to Allah] ٱلَّذِى [the One Who] فَضَّلَنَا [has favored us] عَلَىٰ [over] كَثِيرٍۢ [many] مِّنْ [of] عِبَادِهِ [His servants] ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ [the believers]
data.transliteration: Walaqad atayna dawoodawasulaymana AAilman waqala alhamdulillahi allathee faddalana AAalakatheerin min AAibadihi almu/mineen

data.textUthmani: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
data.wordByWord: وَوَرِثَ [And inherited] سُلَيْمَـٰنُ [Sulaiman] دَاوُۥدَ ۖ [Dawood] وَقَالَ [And he said] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O] ٱلنَّاسُ [people] عُلِّمْنَا [We have been taught] مَنطِقَ [(the) language] ٱلطَّيْرِ [(of) the birds] وَأُوتِينَا [and we have been given] مِن [from] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍ ۖ [thing] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَهُوَ [surely, it] ٱلْفَضْلُ [(is) the favor] ٱلْمُبِينُ [evident]
data.transliteration: Wawaritha sulaymanu dawoodawaqala ya ayyuha annasuAAullimna mantiqa attayri waooteenamin kulli shay-in inna hatha lahuwa alfadlualmubeen

data.textUthmani: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَحُشِرَ [And were gathered] لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ [for Sulaiman] جُنُودُهُۥ [his hosts] مِنَ [of] ٱلْجِنِّ [jinn] وَٱلْإِنسِ [and the men] وَٱلطَّيْرِ [and the birds] فَهُمْ [and they] يُوزَعُونَ [(were) set in rows]
data.transliteration: Wahushira lisulaymanajunooduhu mina aljinni wal-insi wattayrifahum yoozaAAoon

data.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَـٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَآ [when] أَتَوْا۟ [they came] عَلَىٰ [to] وَادِ [(the) valley] ٱلنَّمْلِ [(of) the ants] قَالَتْ [said] نَمْلَةٌۭ [an ant] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O] ٱلنَّمْلُ [ants] ٱدْخُلُوا۟ [Enter] مَسَـٰكِنَكُمْ [your dwellings] لَا [lest not crush you] يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ [lest not crush you] سُلَيْمَـٰنُ [Sulaiman] وَجُنُودُهُۥ [and his hosts] وَهُمْ [while they] لَا [(do) not perceive] يَشْعُرُونَ [(do) not perceive]
data.transliteration: Hatta itha ataw AAalawadi annamli qalat namlatun ya ayyuhaannamlu odkhuloo masakinakum la yahtimannakumsulaymanu wajunooduhu wahum la yashAAuroon

data.textUthmani: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَـٰلِحًا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَتَبَسَّمَ [So he smiled ] ضَاحِكًۭا [laughing] مِّن [at] قَوْلِهَا [her speech] وَقَالَ [and said] رَبِّ [My Lord] أَوْزِعْنِىٓ [Grant me (the) power] أَنْ [that] أَشْكُرَ [I may thank You] نِعْمَتَكَ [(for) Your Favor] ٱلَّتِىٓ [which] أَنْعَمْتَ [You have bestowed] عَلَىَّ [on me] وَعَلَىٰ [and on] وَٰلِدَىَّ [my parents] وَأَنْ [and that] أَعْمَلَ [I may do] صَـٰلِحًۭا [righteous (deeds)] تَرْضَىٰهُ [that will please You] وَأَدْخِلْنِى [And admit me] بِرَحْمَتِكَ [by Your Mercy] فِى [among] عِبَادِكَ [Your slaves] ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ [righteous]
data.transliteration: Fatabassama dahikan min qawlihawaqala rabbi awziAAnee an ashkura niAAmataka allateeanAAamta AAalayya waAAala walidayya waan aAAmala salihantardahu waadkhilnee birahmatika fee AAibadikaassaliheen

data.textUthmani: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَتَفَقَّدَ [And he inspected] ٱلطَّيْرَ [the birds] فَقَالَ [and said] مَا [Why] لِىَ [Why] لَآ [not] أَرَى [I see] ٱلْهُدْهُدَ [the hoopoe] أَمْ [or] كَانَ [is he] مِنَ [from] ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ [the absent]
data.transliteration: Watafaqqada attayra faqalama liya la ara alhudhuda am kana minaalgha-ibeen

data.textUthmani: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ [I will surely punish him] عَذَابًۭا [(with) a punishment] شَدِيدًا [severe] أَوْ [or] لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ [I will surely slaughter him] أَوْ [unless] لَيَأْتِيَنِّى [he brings me] بِسُلْطَـٰنٍۢ [a reason] مُّبِينٍۢ [clear]
data.transliteration: LaoAAaththibannahu AAathabanshadeedan aw laathbahannahu aw laya/tiyannee bisultaninmubeen

data.textUthmani: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍ يَقِينٍ
data.wordByWord: فَمَكَثَ [So he stayed] غَيْرَ [not] بَعِيدٍۢ [long] فَقَالَ [and he said] أَحَطتُ [I have encompassed] بِمَا [that which] لَمْ [not] تُحِطْ [you have encompassed] بِهِۦ [it] وَجِئْتُكَ [and I have come to you] مِن [from] سَبَإٍۭ [Saba] بِنَبَإٍۢ [with news] يَقِينٍ [certain]
data.transliteration: Famakatha ghayra baAAeedin faqala ahattubima lam tuhit bihi waji/tuka min saba-inbinaba-in yaqeen

words.translation: and I have come to you

data.textUthmani: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةً تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنِّى [Indeed, I] وَجَدتُّ [found] ٱمْرَأَةًۭ [a woman] تَمْلِكُهُمْ [ruling them] وَأُوتِيَتْ [and she has been given] مِن [of] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] وَلَهَا [and for her] عَرْشٌ [(is) a throne] عَظِيمٌۭ [great]
data.transliteration: Innee wajadtu imraatan tamlikuhum waootiyatmin kulli shay-in walaha AAarshun AAatheem

data.textUthmani: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَجَدتُّهَا [And I found her] وَقَوْمَهَا [and her people] يَسْجُدُونَ [prostrating] لِلشَّمْسِ [to the sun] مِن [instead of Allah] دُونِ [instead of Allah] ٱللَّهِ [instead of Allah] وَزَيَّنَ [and has made fair-seeming] لَهُمُ [to them] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ [the Shaitaan] أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ [their deeds] فَصَدَّهُمْ [and averted them] عَنِ [from] ٱلسَّبِيلِ [the Way] فَهُمْ [so they] لَا [(are) not] يَهْتَدُونَ [guided]
data.transliteration: Wajadtuha waqawmaha yasjudoonalishshamsi min dooni Allahi wazayyana lahumu ashshaytanuaAAmalahum fasaddahum AAani assabeeli fahumla yahtadoon

data.textUthmani: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَلَّا [That not] يَسْجُدُوا۟ [they prostrate] لِلَّهِ [to Allah] ٱلَّذِى [the One Who] يُخْرِجُ [brings forth] ٱلْخَبْءَ [the hidden] فِى [in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَيَعْلَمُ [and knows] مَا [what] تُخْفُونَ [you conceal] وَمَا [and what] تُعْلِنُونَ [you declare]
data.transliteration: Alla yasjudoo lillahi allatheeyukhriju alkhabaa fee assamawati wal-ardiwayaAAlamu ma tukhfoona wama tuAAlinoon

data.textUthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩
data.wordByWord: ٱللَّهُ [Allah] لَآ [(there is) no] إِلَـٰهَ [god] إِلَّا [but] هُوَ [He] رَبُّ [(the) Lord] ٱلْعَرْشِ [(of) the Throne] ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩‏ [the Great]
data.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illahuwa rabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem

data.textUthmani: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ قَالَ [He said] سَنَنظُرُ [We will see] أَصَدَقْتَ [whether you speak (the) truth] أَمْ [or] كُنتَ [you are] مِنَ [of] ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ [the liars]
data.transliteration: Qala sananthuru asadaqtaam kunta mina alkathibeen

data.textUthmani: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَـٰبِى هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱذْهَب [Go] بِّكِتَـٰبِى [with my letter] هَـٰذَا [this] فَأَلْقِهْ [and deliver it] إِلَيْهِمْ [to them] ثُمَّ [Then] تَوَلَّ [turn away] عَنْهُمْ [from them] فَٱنظُرْ [and see] مَاذَا [what] يَرْجِعُونَ [they return]
data.transliteration: Ithhab bikitabee hathafaalqih ilayhim thumma tawalla AAanhum fanthurmatha yarjiAAoon

data.textUthmani: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَـٰبٌ كَرِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O] ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ [chiefs] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed [I]] أُلْقِىَ [is delivered] إِلَىَّ [to me] كِتَـٰبٌۭ [a letter] كَرِيمٌ [noble]
data.transliteration: Qalat ya ayyuha almalaoinnee olqiya ilayya kitabun kareem

data.textUthmani: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, it] مِن [(is) from] سُلَيْمَـٰنَ [Sulaiman] وَإِنَّهُۥ [and indeed it (is)] بِسْمِ [In the name] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] ٱلرَّحِيمِ [the Most Merciful]
data.transliteration: Innahu min sulaymana wa-innahu bismiAllahi arrahmani arraheem

data.textUthmani: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: أَلَّا [That not] تَعْلُوا۟ [exalt yourselves] عَلَىَّ [against me] وَأْتُونِى [but come to me] مُسْلِمِينَ [(in) submission]
data.transliteration: Alla taAAloo AAalayya wa/tooneemuslimeen

data.textUthmani: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ
data.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O] ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ [chiefs] أَفْتُونِى [Advise me] فِىٓ [in] أَمْرِى [my affair] مَا [Not] كُنتُ [I would be] قَاطِعَةً [the one to decide] أَمْرًا [any matter] حَتَّىٰ [until] تَشْهَدُونِ [you are present with me]
data.transliteration: Qalat ya ayyuha almalaoaftoonee fee amree ma kuntu qatiAAatan amran hattatashhadoon

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] نَحْنُ [We] أُو۟لُوا۟ [(are) possessors] قُوَّةٍۢ [(of) strength] وَأُو۟لُوا۟ [and possessors] بَأْسٍۢ [(of) might] شَدِيدٍۢ [great] وَٱلْأَمْرُ [and the command] إِلَيْكِ [(is) up to you] فَٱنظُرِى [so look] مَاذَا [what] تَأْمُرِينَ [you will command]
data.transliteration: Qaloo nahnu oloo quwwatinwaoloo ba/sin shadeedin wal-amru ilayki fanthureematha ta/mureen

data.textUthmani: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةً ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلْمُلُوكَ [the kings] إِذَا [when] دَخَلُوا۟ [they enter] قَرْيَةً [a town] أَفْسَدُوهَا [they ruin it] وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ [and make] أَعِزَّةَ [(the) most honorable] أَهْلِهَآ [(of) its people] أَذِلَّةًۭ ۖ [(the) lowest] وَكَذَٰلِكَ [And thus] يَفْعَلُونَ [they do]
data.transliteration: Qalat inna almulooka ithadakhaloo qaryatan afsadooha wajaAAaloo aAAizzata ahlihaathillatan wakathalika yafAAaloon

data.textUthmani: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنِّى [But indeed, I am] مُرْسِلَةٌ [going to send] إِلَيْهِم [to them] بِهَدِيَّةٍۢ [a gift] فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ [and see] بِمَ [with what] يَرْجِعُ [return] ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ [the messengers]
data.transliteration: Wa-innee mursilatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanathiratunbima yarjiAAu almursaloon

data.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [So when] جَآءَ [came] سُلَيْمَـٰنَ [(to) Sulaiman] قَالَ [he said] أَتُمِدُّونَنِ [Will you provide me] بِمَالٍۢ [with wealth] فَمَآ [But what] ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ [Allah has given me] ٱللَّهُ [Allah has given me] خَيْرٌۭ [(is) better] مِّمَّآ [than what] ءَاتَىٰكُم [He has given you] بَلْ [Nay] أَنتُم [you] بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ [in your gift] تَفْرَحُونَ [rejoice]
data.transliteration: Falamma jaa sulaymana qalaatumiddoonani bimalin fama ataniyaAllahu khayrun mimma atakum bal antumbihadiyyatikum tafrahoon

data.textUthmani: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةً وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱرْجِعْ [Return] إِلَيْهِمْ [to them] فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم [surely, we will come to them] بِجُنُودٍۢ [with hosts] لَّا [not] قِبَلَ [(is) resistance] لَهُم [for them] بِهَا [of it] وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم [and surely, we will drive them out] مِّنْهَآ [from there] أَذِلَّةًۭ [(in) humiliation] وَهُمْ [and they] صَـٰغِرُونَ [(will be) abased]
data.transliteration: IrjiAA ilayhim falana/tiyannahum bijunoodinla qibala lahum biha walanukhrijannahum minhaathillatan wahum saghiroon

words.translation: surely, we will come to them
and surely, we will drive them out

data.textUthmani: قَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O] ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ [chiefs] أَيُّكُمْ [Which of you] يَأْتِينِى [will bring me] بِعَرْشِهَا [her throne] قَبْلَ [before] أَن [that] يَأْتُونِى [they come to me] مُسْلِمِينَ [(in) submission]
data.transliteration: Qala ya ayyuha almalaoayyukum ya/teenee biAAarshiha qabla an ya/toonee muslimeen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [Said] عِفْرِيتٌۭ [a strong one] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْجِنِّ [the jinn] أَنَا۠ [I] ءَاتِيكَ [will bring it to you] بِهِۦ [will bring it to you] قَبْلَ [before] أَن [[that]] تَقُومَ [you rise] مِن [from] مَّقَامِكَ ۖ [your place] وَإِنِّى [And indeed, I am] عَلَيْهِ [for it] لَقَوِىٌّ [surely, strong] أَمِينٌۭ [trustworthy]
data.transliteration: Qala AAifreetun mina aljinni anaateeka bihi qabla an taqooma min maqamika wa-inneAAalayhi laqawiyyun ameen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّ كَرِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [Said] ٱلَّذِى [one who] عِندَهُۥ [with him] عِلْمٌۭ [(was) knowledge] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Scripture] أَنَا۠ [I] ءَاتِيكَ [will bring it to you] بِهِۦ [will bring it to you] قَبْلَ [before] أَن [[that]] يَرْتَدَّ [returns] إِلَيْكَ [to you] طَرْفُكَ ۚ [your glance] فَلَمَّا [Then when] رَءَاهُ [he saw it] مُسْتَقِرًّا [placed] عِندَهُۥ [before him] قَالَ [he said] هَـٰذَا [This] مِن [(is) from] فَضْلِ [(the) Favor] رَبِّى [(of) my Lord] لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ [to test me] ءَأَشْكُرُ [whether I am grateful] أَمْ [or] أَكْفُرُ ۖ [I am ungrateful] وَمَن [And whoever] شَكَرَ [(is) grateful] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] يَشْكُرُ [he is grateful] لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ [for his own soul] وَمَن [And whoever] كَفَرَ [(is) ungrateful] فَإِنَّ [then indeed] رَبِّى [my Lord] غَنِىٌّۭ [(is) Self-sufficient] كَرِيمٌۭ [Noble]
data.transliteration: Qala allathee AAindahu AAilmunmina alkitabi ana ateeka bihi qabla anyartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahumustaqirran AAindahu qala hatha min fadlirabbee liyabluwanee aashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fa-innamayashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna rabbee ghaniyyun kareem

data.textUthmani: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] نَكِّرُوا۟ [Disguise] لَهَا [for her] عَرْشَهَا [her throne] نَنظُرْ [we will see] أَتَهْتَدِىٓ [whether she will be guided] أَمْ [or] تَكُونُ [will be] مِنَ [of] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] لَا [are not guided] يَهْتَدُونَ [are not guided]
data.transliteration: Qala nakkiroo laha AAarshahananthur atahtadee am takoonu mina allatheenala yahtadoon

data.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [So when] جَآءَتْ [she came] قِيلَ [it was said] أَهَـٰكَذَا [Is like this] عَرْشُكِ ۖ [your throne] قَالَتْ [She said] كَأَنَّهُۥ [It is like] هُوَ ۚ [it] وَأُوتِينَا [And we were given] ٱلْعِلْمَ [the knowledge] مِن [before her] قَبْلِهَا [before her] وَكُنَّا [and we have been] مُسْلِمِينَ [Muslims]
data.transliteration: Falamma jaat qeela ahakathaAAarshuki qalat kaannahu huwa waooteena alAAilmamin qabliha wakunna muslimeen

data.textUthmani: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَـٰفِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَصَدَّهَا [And has averted her] مَا [what] كَانَت [she used (to)] تَّعْبُدُ [worship] مِن [besides] دُونِ [besides] ٱللَّهِ ۖ [Allah] إِنَّهَا [Indeed, she] كَانَتْ [was] مِن [from] قَوْمٍۢ [a people] كَـٰفِرِينَ [who disbelieve]
data.transliteration: Wasaddaha ma kanattaAAbudu min dooni Allahi innaha kanat minqawmin kafireen

data.textUthmani: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌ مُّمَرَّدٌ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
data.wordByWord: قِيلَ [It was said] لَهَا [to her] ٱدْخُلِى [Enter] ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ [the palace] فَلَمَّا [Then when] رَأَتْهُ [she saw it] حَسِبَتْهُ [she thought it] لُجَّةًۭ [(was) a pool] وَكَشَفَتْ [and she uncovered] عَن [[on]] سَاقَيْهَا ۚ [her shins] قَالَ [He said] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, it] صَرْحٌۭ [(is) a palace] مُّمَرَّدٌۭ [made smooth] مِّن [of] قَوَارِيرَ ۗ [glass] قَالَتْ [She said] رَبِّ [My Lord] إِنِّى [indeed, I] ظَلَمْتُ [[I] have wronged] نَفْسِى [myself] وَأَسْلَمْتُ [and I submit] مَعَ [with] سُلَيْمَـٰنَ [Sulaiman] لِلَّهِ [to Allah] رَبِّ [(the) Lord] ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [(of) the worlds]
data.transliteration: Qeela laha odkhulee assarhafalamma raat-hu hasibat-hu lujjatan wakashafat AAansaqayha qala innahu sarhunmumarradun min qawareera qalat rabbi innee thalamtunafsee waaslamtu maAAa sulaymana lillahi rabbi alAAalameen

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] أَرْسَلْنَآ [We sent] إِلَىٰ [to] ثَمُودَ [Thamud] أَخَاهُمْ [their brother] صَـٰلِحًا [Salih] أَنِ [that] ٱعْبُدُوا۟ [Worship] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] فَإِذَا [Then behold] هُمْ [They] فَرِيقَانِ [(became) two parties] يَخْتَصِمُونَ [quarreling]
data.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna ila thamoodaakhahum salihan ani oAAbudoo Allahafa-itha hum fareeqani yakhtasimoon

data.textUthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] يَـٰقَوْمِ [O my people] لِمَ [Why] تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ [(do) you seek to hasten] بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ [the evil] قَبْلَ [before] ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ [the good] لَوْلَا [Why not] تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ [you ask forgiveness] ٱللَّهَ [(of) Allah] لَعَلَّكُمْ [so that you may] تُرْحَمُونَ [receive mercy]
data.transliteration: Qala ya qawmi limatastaAAjiloona bissayyi-ati qabla alhasanati lawlatastaghfiroona Allaha laAAallakum turhamoon

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تُفْتَنُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] ٱطَّيَّرْنَا [We consider you a bad omen] بِكَ [We consider you a bad omen] وَبِمَن [and those] مَّعَكَ ۚ [with you] قَالَ [He said] طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ [Your bad omen] عِندَ [(is) with] ٱللَّهِ ۖ [Allah] بَلْ [Nay] أَنتُمْ [you] قَوْمٌۭ [(are) a people] تُفْتَنُونَ [being tested]
data.transliteration: Qaloo ittayyarna bikawabiman maAAaka qala ta-irukum AAinda Allahibal antum qawmun tuftanoon

words.translation: We consider you a bad omen
We consider you a bad omen

data.textUthmani: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَكَانَ [And were] فِى [in] ٱلْمَدِينَةِ [the city] تِسْعَةُ [nine] رَهْطٍۢ [family heads] يُفْسِدُونَ [they were spreading corruption] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the land] وَلَا [and not] يُصْلِحُونَ [reforming]
data.transliteration: Wakana fee almadeenati tisAAatu rahtinyufsidoona fee al-ardi wala yuslihoon

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] تَقَاسَمُوا۟ [Swear to each other] بِٱللَّهِ [by Allah] لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ [surely, we will attack him by night] وَأَهْلَهُۥ [and his family] ثُمَّ [Then] لَنَقُولَنَّ [we will surely say] لِوَلِيِّهِۦ [to his heir] مَا [Not] شَهِدْنَا [we witnessed] مَهْلِكَ [(the) destruction] أَهْلِهِۦ [(of) his family] وَإِنَّا [and indeed, we] لَصَـٰدِقُونَ [(are) surely truthful]
data.transliteration: Qaloo taqasamoo billahilanubayyitannahu waahlahu thumma lanaqoolanna liwaliyyihi mashahidna mahlika ahlihi wa-inna lasadiqoon

words.translation: surely, we will attack him by night

data.textUthmani: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَكَرُوا۟ [So they plotted] مَكْرًۭا [a plot] وَمَكَرْنَا [and We planned] مَكْرًۭا [a plan] وَهُمْ [while they] لَا [(did) not] يَشْعُرُونَ [perceive]
data.transliteration: Wamakaroo makran wamakarna makranwahum la yashAAuroon

data.textUthmani: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَٱنظُرْ [Then see] كَيْفَ [how] كَانَ [was] عَـٰقِبَةُ [(the) end] مَكْرِهِمْ [(of) their plot] أَنَّا [that We] دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ [destroyed them] وَقَوْمَهُمْ [and their people] أَجْمَعِينَ [all]
data.transliteration: Fanthur kayfa kanaAAaqibatu makrihim anna dammarnahumwaqawmahum ajmaAAeen

data.textUthmani: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَتِلْكَ [So, these] بُيُوتُهُمْ [(are) their houses] خَاوِيَةًۢ [ruined] بِمَا [because] ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ [they wronged] إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَـَٔايَةًۭ [surely, is a sign] لِّقَوْمٍۢ [for a people] يَعْلَمُونَ [who know]
data.transliteration: Fatilka buyootuhum khawiyatan bimathalamoo inna fee thalika laayatanliqawmin yaAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: وَأَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَنجَيْنَا [And We saved] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believed] وَكَانُوا۟ [and used (to)] يَتَّقُونَ [fear (Allah)]
data.transliteration: Waanjayna allatheena amanoowakanoo yattaqoon

data.textUthmani: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلُوطًا [And Lut] إِذْ [when] قَالَ [he said] لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ [to his people] أَتَأْتُونَ [Do you commit] ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ [[the] immorality] وَأَنتُمْ [while you] تُبْصِرُونَ [see]
data.transliteration: Walootan ith qalaliqawmihi ata/toona alfahishata waantum tubsiroon

data.textUthmani: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةً مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تَجْهَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَئِنَّكُمْ [Why do you] لَتَأْتُونَ [approach] ٱلرِّجَالَ [the men] شَهْوَةًۭ [(with) lust] مِّن [instead of] دُونِ [instead of] ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ [the women] بَلْ [Nay] أَنتُمْ [you] قَوْمٌۭ [(are) a people] تَجْهَلُونَ [ignorant]
data.transliteration: A-innakum lata/toona arrijalashahwatan min dooni annisa-i bal antum qawmuntajhaloon

data.textUthmani: ۞ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ فَمَا [But not] كَانَ [was] جَوَابَ [(the) answer] قَوْمِهِۦٓ [(of) his people] إِلَّآ [except] أَن [that] قَالُوٓا۟ [they said] أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ [Drive out] ءَالَ [(the) family] لُوطٍۢ [(of) Lut] مِّن [from] قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ [your town] إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] أُنَاسٌۭ [(are) people] يَتَطَهَّرُونَ [who keep clean and pure]
data.transliteration: Fama kana jawabaqawmihi illa an qaloo akhrijoo ala lootinmin qaryatikum innahum onasun yatatahharoon

data.textUthmani: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَـٰهَا مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ [So We saved him] وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ [and his family] إِلَّا [except] ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ [his wife] قَدَّرْنَـٰهَا [We destined her] مِنَ [(to be) of] ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ [those who remained behind]
data.transliteration: Faanjaynahu waahlahu illaimraatahu qaddarnaha mina alghabireen

data.textUthmani: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَمْطَرْنَا [And We rained] عَلَيْهِم [upon them] مَّطَرًۭا ۖ [a rain] فَسَآءَ [and was evil] مَطَرُ [(the) rain] ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ [(on) those who were warned]
data.transliteration: Waamtarna AAalayhim mataranfasaa mataru almunthareen

data.textUthmani: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
data.wordByWord: قُلِ [Say] ٱلْحَمْدُ [All praise (be)] لِلَّهِ [to Allah] وَسَلَـٰمٌ [and peace (be)] عَلَىٰ [upon] عِبَادِهِ [His slaves] ٱلَّذِينَ [those whom] ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ۗ [He has chosen] ءَآللَّهُ [Is Allah] خَيْرٌ [better] أَمَّا [or what] يُشْرِكُونَ [they associate (with Him)]
data.transliteration: Quli alhamdu lillahi wasalamunAAala AAibadihi allatheena istafaallahu khayrun amma yushrikoon

data.textUthmani: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنۢبِتُوا۟ شَجَرَهَآ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ يَعْدِلُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمَّنْ [Or Who] خَلَقَ [has created] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضَ [and the earth] وَأَنزَلَ [and sent down] لَكُم [for you] مِّنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] مَآءًۭ [water] فَأَنۢبَتْنَا [And We caused to grow] بِهِۦ [thereby] حَدَآئِقَ [gardens] ذَاتَ [of beauty (and delight)] بَهْجَةٍۢ [of beauty (and delight)] مَّا [not] كَانَ [it is] لَكُمْ [for you] أَن [that] تُنۢبِتُوا۟ [you cause to grow] شَجَرَهَآ ۗ [their trees] أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ [Is there any god] مَّعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [Allah] بَلْ [Nay] هُمْ [they] قَوْمٌۭ [(are) a people] يَعْدِلُونَ [who ascribe equals]
data.transliteration: Amman khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda waanzala lakum mina assama-imaan faanbatna bihi hada-iqa thatabahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitoo shajarahaa-ilahun maAAa Allahi bal hum qawmun yaAAdiloon

data.textUthmani: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلْأَرْضَ قَرَارًا وَجَعَلَ خِلَـٰلَهَآ أَنْهَـٰرًا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمَّن [Or Who] جَعَلَ [made] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] قَرَارًۭا [a firm abode] وَجَعَلَ [and made] خِلَـٰلَهَآ [(in) its midst] أَنْهَـٰرًۭا [rivers] وَجَعَلَ [and made] لَهَا [for it] رَوَٰسِىَ [firm mountains] وَجَعَلَ [and made] بَيْنَ [between] ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ [the two seas] حَاجِزًا ۗ [a barrier] أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ [Is there any god] مَّعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [Allah] بَلْ [Nay] أَكْثَرُهُمْ [most of them] لَا [(do) not] يَعْلَمُونَ [know]
data.transliteration: Amman jaAAala al-arda qararanwajaAAala khilalaha anharan wajaAAala laharawasiya wajaAAala bayna albahrayni hajizana-ilahun maAAa Allahi bal aktharuhum layaAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمَّن [Or Who] يُجِيبُ [responds] ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ [(to) the distressed one] إِذَا [when] دَعَاهُ [he calls Him] وَيَكْشِفُ [and He removes] ٱلسُّوٓءَ [the evil] وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ [and makes you] خُلَفَآءَ [inheritors] ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ [(of) the earth] أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ [Is there any god] مَّعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [Allah] قَلِيلًۭا [Little] مَّا [(is) what] تَذَكَّرُونَ [you remember]
data.transliteration: Amman yujeebu almudtarra ithadaAAahu wayakshifu assoo-a wayajAAalukum khulafaaal-ardi a-ilahun maAAa Allahi qaleelan matathakkaroon

data.textUthmani: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ تَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمَّن [Or Who] يَهْدِيكُمْ [guides you] فِى [in] ظُلُمَـٰتِ [(the) darkness[es]] ٱلْبَرِّ [(of) the land] وَٱلْبَحْرِ [and the sea] وَمَن [and Who] يُرْسِلُ [sends] ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ [the winds] بُشْرًۢا [(as) glad tidings] بَيْنَ [before] يَدَىْ [before] رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ [His Mercy] أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ [Is there any god] مَّعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [Allah] تَعَـٰلَى [High is] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] عَمَّا [above what] يُشْرِكُونَ [they associate (with Him)]
data.transliteration: Amman yahdeekum fee thulumatialbarri walbahri waman yursilu arriyahabushran bayna yaday rahmatihi a-ilahun maAAa AllahitaAAala Allahu AAamma yushrikoon

data.textUthmani: أَمَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
data.wordByWord: أَمَّن [Or Who] يَبْدَؤُا۟ [originates] ٱلْخَلْقَ [the creation] ثُمَّ [then] يُعِيدُهُۥ [repeats it] وَمَن [and Who] يَرْزُقُكُم [provides you] مِّنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ [and the earth] أَءِلَـٰهٌۭ [Is there any god] مَّعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [Allah] قُلْ [Say] هَاتُوا۟ [Bring forth] بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ [your proof] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you are] صَـٰدِقِينَ [truthful]
data.transliteration: Amman yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhuwaman yarzuqukum mina assama-i wal-ardia-ilahun maAAa Allahi qul hatoo burhanakumin kuntum sadiqeen

data.textUthmani: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْغَيْبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
data.wordByWord: قُل [Say] لَّا [No (one)] يَعْلَمُ [knows] مَن [whoever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] ٱلْغَيْبَ [(of) the unseen] إِلَّا [except] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah] وَمَا [and not] يَشْعُرُونَ [they perceive] أَيَّانَ [when] يُبْعَثُونَ [they will be resurrected]
data.transliteration: Qul la yaAAlamu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi alghayba illa Allahu wamayashAAuroona ayyana yubAAathoon

data.textUthmani: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: بَلِ [Nay] ٱدَّٰرَكَ [is arrested] عِلْمُهُمْ [their knowledge] فِى [of] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ [the Hereafter] بَلْ [Nay] هُمْ [they] فِى [(are) in] شَكٍّۢ [doubt] مِّنْهَا ۖ [about it] بَلْ [Nay] هُم [they] مِّنْهَا [about it] عَمُونَ [(are) blind]
data.transliteration: Bali iddaraka AAilmuhum fee al-akhiratibal hum fee shakkin minha bal hum minha AAamoon

data.textUthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And say] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوٓا۟ [disbelieve] أَءِذَا [What, when] كُنَّا [we have become] تُرَٰبًۭا [dust] وَءَابَآؤُنَآ [and our forefathers] أَئِنَّا [will we] لَمُخْرَجُونَ [surely be brought out]
data.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroo a-ithakunna turaban waabaona a-innalamukhrajoon

data.textUthmani: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَـٰذَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
data.wordByWord: لَقَدْ [Certainly] وُعِدْنَا [we have been promised] هَـٰذَا [this] نَحْنُ [we] وَءَابَآؤُنَا [and our forefathers] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] إِنْ [Not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّآ [except] أَسَـٰطِيرُ [tales] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the former (people)]
data.transliteration: Laqad wuAAidna hatha nahnuwaabaona min qablu in hatha illaasateeru al-awwaleen

data.textUthmani: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] سِيرُوا۟ [Travel] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the land] فَٱنظُرُوا۟ [and see] كَيْفَ [how] كَانَ [was] عَـٰقِبَةُ [(the) end] ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ [(of) the criminals]
data.transliteration: Qul seeroo fee al-ardi fanthurookayfa kana AAaqibatu almujrimeen

data.textUthmani: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَا [And (do) not] تَحْزَنْ [grieve] عَلَيْهِمْ [over them] وَلَا [and not] تَكُن [be] فِى [in] ضَيْقٍۢ [distress] مِّمَّا [from what] يَمْكُرُونَ [they plot]
data.transliteration: Wala tahzan AAalayhim walatakun fee dayqin mimma yamkuroon

data.textUthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَيَقُولُونَ [And they say] مَتَىٰ [When] هَـٰذَا [(will) this] ٱلْوَعْدُ [promise (be fulfilled)] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you are] صَـٰدِقِينَ [truthful]
data.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen

data.textUthmani: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] عَسَىٰٓ [Perhaps] أَن [that] يَكُونَ [is] رَدِفَ [close behind] لَكُم [you] بَعْضُ [some] ٱلَّذِى [(of) that which] تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ [you seek to hasten]
data.transliteration: Qul AAasa an yakoona radifa lakumbaAAdu allathee tastaAAjiloon

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] لَذُو [(is) full of Bounty] فَضْلٍ [(is) full of Bounty] عَلَى [for] ٱلنَّاسِ [the mankind] وَلَـٰكِنَّ [but] أَكْثَرَهُمْ [most of them] لَا [(are) not] يَشْكُرُونَ [grateful]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna rabbaka lathoo fadlinAAala annasi walakinna aktharahum layashkuroon

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] لَيَعْلَمُ [surely knows] مَا [what] تُكِنُّ [conceals] صُدُورُهُمْ [their breasts] وَمَا [and what] يُعْلِنُونَ [they declare]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna rabbaka layaAAlamu ma tukinnusudooruhum wama yuAAlinoon

data.textUthmani: وَمَا مِنْ غَآئِبَةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not (is)] مِنْ [any (thing)] غَآئِبَةٍۢ [hidden] فِى [in] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] إِلَّا [but] فِى [(is) in] كِتَـٰبٍۢ [a Record] مُّبِينٍ [clear]
data.transliteration: Wama min gha-ibatin fee assama-iwal-ardi illa fee kitabin mubeen

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكْثَرَ ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [[the] Quran] يَقُصُّ [relates] عَلَىٰ [to] بَنِىٓ [(the) Children] إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ [(of) Israel] أَكْثَرَ [most] ٱلَّذِى [(of) that] هُمْ [they] فِيهِ [in it] يَخْتَلِفُونَ [differ]
data.transliteration: Inna hatha alqur-ana yaqussuAAala banee isra-eela akthara allathee humfeehi yakhtalifoon

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّهُۥ [And indeed, it] لَهُدًۭى [(is) surely a guidance] وَرَحْمَةٌۭ [and a mercy] لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ [for the believers]
data.transliteration: Wa-innahu lahudan warahmatunlilmu/mineen

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] يَقْضِى [will judge] بَيْنَهُم [between them] بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ [by His Judgment] وَهُوَ [and He] ٱلْعَزِيزُ [(is) the All-Mighty] ٱلْعَلِيمُ [the All-Knower]
data.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yaqdee baynahum bihukmihiwahuwa alAAazeezu alAAaleem

data.textUthmani: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلْمُبِينِ
data.wordByWord: فَتَوَكَّلْ [So put your trust] عَلَى [in] ٱللَّهِ ۖ [Allah] إِنَّكَ [indeed, you] عَلَى [(are) on] ٱلْحَقِّ [the truth] ٱلْمُبِينِ [manifest]
data.transliteration: Fatawakkal AAala Allahi innakaAAala alhaqqi almubeen

data.textUthmani: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَلَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوْا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّكَ [Indeed, you] لَا [(can) not] تُسْمِعُ [cause to hear] ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ [the dead] وَلَا [and not] تُسْمِعُ [can you cause to hear] ٱلصُّمَّ [the deaf] ٱلدُّعَآءَ [the call] إِذَا [when] وَلَّوْا۟ [they turn back] مُدْبِرِينَ [retreating]
data.transliteration: Innaka la tusmiAAu almawta walatusmiAAu assumma adduAAaa ithawallaw mudbireen

data.textUthmani: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَـٰدِى ٱلْعُمْىِ عَن ضَلَـٰلَتِهِمْ ۖ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَآ [And not] أَنتَ [(can) you] بِهَـٰدِى [guide] ٱلْعُمْىِ [the blind] عَن [from] ضَلَـٰلَتِهِمْ ۖ [their error] إِن [Not] تُسْمِعُ [you can cause to hear] إِلَّا [except] مَن [(those) who] يُؤْمِنُ [believe] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا [in Our Signs] فَهُم [so they] مُّسْلِمُونَ [(are) Muslims]
data.transliteration: Wama anta bihadee alAAumyiAAan dalalatihim in tusmiAAu illa manyu/minu bi-ayatina fahum muslimoon

data.textUthmani: ۞ وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَخْرَجْنَا لَهُمْ دَآبَّةً مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ وَإِذَا [And when] وَقَعَ [(is) fulfilled] ٱلْقَوْلُ [the word] عَلَيْهِمْ [against them] أَخْرَجْنَا [We will bring forth] لَهُمْ [for them] دَآبَّةًۭ [a creature] مِّنَ [from] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] تُكَلِّمُهُمْ [speaking to them] أَنَّ [that] ٱلنَّاسَ [the people] كَانُوا۟ [were] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا [of Our Signs] لَا [not] يُوقِنُونَ [certain]
data.transliteration: Wa-itha waqaAAa alqawlu AAalayhimakhrajna lahum dabbatan mina al-arditukallimuhum anna annasa kanoo bi-ayatinala yooqinoon

data.textUthmani: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ فَوْجًا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَيَوْمَ [And (the) Day] نَحْشُرُ [We will gather] مِن [from] كُلِّ [every] أُمَّةٍۢ [nation] فَوْجًۭا [a troop] مِّمَّن [of (those) who] يُكَذِّبُ [deny] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا [Our Signs] فَهُمْ [and they] يُوزَعُونَ [will be set in rows]
data.transliteration: Wayawma nahshuru min kulli ommatinfawjan mimman yukaththibu bi-ayatinafahum yoozaAAoon

data.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّبْتُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَمْ تُحِيطُوا۟ بِهَا عِلْمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] جَآءُو [they come] قَالَ [He will say] أَكَذَّبْتُم [Did you deny] بِـَٔايَـٰتِى [My Signs] وَلَمْ [while not] تُحِيطُوا۟ [you encompassed] بِهَا [them] عِلْمًا [(in) knowledge] أَمَّاذَا [or what] كُنتُمْ [you used (to)] تَعْمَلُونَ [do]
data.transliteration: Hatta itha jaooqala akaththabtum bi-ayatee walam tuheetoobiha AAilman ammatha kuntum taAAmaloon

data.textUthmani: وَوَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَوَقَعَ [And (will be) fulfilled] ٱلْقَوْلُ [the word] عَلَيْهِم [against them] بِمَا [because] ظَلَمُوا۟ [they wronged] فَهُمْ [and they] لَا [(will) not] يَنطِقُونَ [speak]
data.transliteration: WawaqaAAa alqawlu AAalayhim bima thalamoofahum la yantiqoon

data.textUthmani: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا جَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِيَسْكُنُوا۟ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Do not] يَرَوْا۟ [they see] أَنَّا [that We] جَعَلْنَا [[We] have made] ٱلَّيْلَ [the night] لِيَسْكُنُوا۟ [that they may rest] فِيهِ [in it] وَٱلنَّهَارَ [and the day] مُبْصِرًا ۚ [giving visibility] إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ [surely (are) Signs] لِّقَوْمٍۢ [for a people] يُؤْمِنُونَ [who believe]
data.transliteration: Alam yaraw anna jaAAalnaallayla liyaskunoo feehi wannahara mubsiraninna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yu/minoon

data.textUthmani: وَيَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوْهُ دَٰخِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَيَوْمَ [And (the) Day] يُنفَخُ [will be blown] فِى [[in]] ٱلصُّورِ [the trumpet] فَفَزِعَ [and will be terrified] مَن [whoever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَمَن [and whoever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] إِلَّا [except] مَن [whom] شَآءَ [Allah wills] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah wills] وَكُلٌّ [And all] أَتَوْهُ [(will) come to Him] دَٰخِرِينَ [humbled]
data.transliteration: Wayawma yunfakhu fee assoorifafaziAAa man fee assamawati waman feeal-ardi illa man shaa Allahu wakullunatawhu dakhireen

data.textUthmani: وَتَرَى ٱلْجِبَالَ تَحْسَبُهَا جَامِدَةً وَهِىَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ ٱلسَّحَابِ ۚ صُنْعَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَتْقَنَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَفْعَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَتَرَى [And you see] ٱلْجِبَالَ [the mountains] تَحْسَبُهَا [thinking them] جَامِدَةًۭ [firmly fixed] وَهِىَ [while they] تَمُرُّ [will pass] مَرَّ [(as the) passing] ٱلسَّحَابِ ۚ [(of) the clouds] صُنْعَ [(The) Work] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] ٱلَّذِىٓ [Who] أَتْقَنَ [perfected] كُلَّ [all] شَىْءٍ ۚ [things] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] خَبِيرٌۢ [(is) All-Aware] بِمَا [of what] تَفْعَلُونَ [you do]
data.transliteration: Watara aljibala tahsabuhajamidatan wahiya tamurru marra assahabi sunAAaAllahi allathee atqana kulla shay-in innahukhabeerun bima tafAAaloon

data.textUthmani: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٍ يَوْمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: مَن [Whoever] جَآءَ [comes] بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ [with the good] فَلَهُۥ [then for him] خَيْرٌۭ [(will be) better] مِّنْهَا [than it] وَهُم [and they] مِّن [from] فَزَعٍۢ [(the) terror] يَوْمَئِذٍ [(of) that Day] ءَامِنُونَ [(will be) safe]
data.transliteration: Man jaa bilhasanatifalahu khayrun minha wahum min fazaAAin yawma-ithinaminoon

data.textUthmani: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِى ٱلنَّارِ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَن [And whoever] جَآءَ [comes] بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ [with the evil] فَكُبَّتْ [will be cast down] وُجُوهُهُمْ [their faces] فِى [in] ٱلنَّارِ [the Fire] هَلْ [Are] تُجْزَوْنَ [you recompensed] إِلَّا [except] مَا [(for) what] كُنتُمْ [you used (to)] تَعْمَلُونَ [do]
data.transliteration: Waman jaa bissayyi-atifakubbat wujoohuhum fee annari hal tujzawna illama kuntum taAAmaloon

data.textUthmani: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ رَبَّ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْبَلْدَةِ ٱلَّذِى حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّمَآ [Only] أُمِرْتُ [I am commanded] أَنْ [that] أَعْبُدَ [I worship] رَبَّ [(the) Lord] هَـٰذِهِ [(of) this] ٱلْبَلْدَةِ [city] ٱلَّذِى [the One Who] حَرَّمَهَا [made it sacred] وَلَهُۥ [and to Him (belongs)] كُلُّ [all] شَىْءٍۢ ۖ [things] وَأُمِرْتُ [And I am commanded] أَنْ [that] أَكُونَ [I be] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ [the Muslims]
data.transliteration: Innama omirtu an aAAbuda rabba hathihialbaldati allathee harramaha walahu kullushay-in waomirtu an akoona mina almuslimeen

data.textUthmani: وَأَنْ أَتْلُوَا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِى لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَنْ [And that] أَتْلُوَا۟ [I recite] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ ۖ [the Quran] فَمَنِ [And whoever] ٱهْتَدَىٰ [accepts guidance] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] يَهْتَدِى [he accepts guidance] لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ [for himself] وَمَن [and whoever] ضَلَّ [goes astray] فَقُلْ [then say] إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَنَا۠ [I am] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ [the warners]
data.transliteration: Waan atluwa alqur-ana famani ihtadafa-innama yahtadee linafsihi waman dalla faqulinnama ana mina almunthireen

data.textUthmani: وَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ فَتَعْرِفُونَهَا ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَقُلِ [And say] ٱلْحَمْدُ [All praise (be)] لِلَّهِ [to Allah] سَيُرِيكُمْ [He will show you] ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ [His Signs] فَتَعْرِفُونَهَا ۚ [and you will recognize them] وَمَا [And your Lord is not] رَبُّكَ [And your Lord is not] بِغَـٰفِلٍ [unaware] عَمَّا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do]
data.transliteration: Waquli alhamdu lillahisayureekum ayatihi fataAArifoonaha wamarabbuka bighafilin AAamma taAAmaloon
